nodes.text: An Ithorian male was a scientist in the Galactic Agricultural Alliance during the High Republic Era. The scientist attended an annual meeting of the Alliance hosted aboard the Starlight Beacon space station. On the station, the Ithorian entered into a disagreement with a fellow scientist, an Amani who was also an old friend. The incident became a fight, which drew a crowd and caught the attention of Administrator Velko Jahen and Chief Ghal Tarpfen, the station's head of security. Tarpfen stunned the two scientists; while Sh'nar Qwasba, the Alliance's president, was infuriated, Jahen assured her that the two would be transported to Starlight's medcenter.
